Scene:
The Gay Quarter Gossips
(Kuruwa banashi / 廓噺)

Play: The Pregnant Mountain Ogress (Heroine) (嫗山姥)

Production: May 1973 National Theatre

– Click image to view.



Narrators (Tayu):

Takemoto Koshijidayū IV (竹本越路大夫 (四))



Shamisen Players:

Nozawa Kizaemon II (野澤喜左衛門 (二))

Nozawa Katsuhei II (see also Nozawa Kizaemon III) (野澤勝平 (二))
